definitions.text: any red eruption of the skin
a series of unexpected and unpleasant occurrences

examples: do something rash that he will forever repent

definitions.text: marked by defiant disregard for danger or consequences; ; -Macaulay
examples: foolhardy enough to try to seize the gun from the hijacker
became the fiercest and most reckless of partisans
a rash attempt to climb Mount Everest
